text:
Bitbucket | Front End developer | Full Time | San Francisco

Join the Atlassian family!

Over the past year, Bitbucket has been buzzing with activity, and we’ve been shipping features like crazy. We’re looking for a few kickass developers to help us move even faster!

Specifically, we're looking to hire a few key front-end developers to help us build a new user-interface and JavaScript components for Bitbucket.

If you want help us make Bitbucket awesome, apply here: http://blog.bitbucket.org/2012/07/24/javascript-devs/
